item.title: howdy yall
item.description: 11:49 Thursday 18 October 2018 JST Back in the day, I collected images that were funny, and put them in a directory called “funny” in my file system. I just found another funny pic on FB, and am putting it here in my funny/ directory

item.title: gonna get marrried
item.description: 10:35 Wednesday 27 January 2016 CST Ma is driving Lin and I to county clerk’s office to register our marriage(!), which hasn’t been officially done yet! 11:10 We have our marriage form thing which we can use to be certified as married! We went to the Travis County office because Ma knew they had pretty licenses. It works out for us because, Travis! The deputy clerk beautifully enunciated “for all intents and purposes” when explaining that the certified copy is essentially the same as the original.
